summary: This is Just a small mod for those who do not like a deer sound and just disable it completely. This is not immersive but. It can be that annoying that you sometimes want to kill all the elks and deer\'s just because of that sound.
descriptionHtml:
This is Just a small application for those who do not like a deer sound and just disable it completely. This is not immersive but. It can be that annoying that you sometimes want to kill all the elks and deer\'s just because of that sound.

Here is a example of that sound: 
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/File:Npc_deer_aggrowarning_01.ogg]Sound[/url]


[b]Installation[/b]

Drag/copy data folder in to skyrim folder its located in: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

Or just hit activate on NMM

[b]Unistallation[/b]
Go to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\sound\\fx\\npc\\elk
and delete the aggrowarning folder

Or just hit deactivate on NMM
author: Qualmeru
